column5: I was talking to a guy at work who said he crossed the border from Montana, and there the border closed late at night. We plan on crossing around 4:00am in Pembina, Interstate 29 out of North Dakota. I know we have come back to the states through there very late. Does anyone know if this crossing closes, or do we have nothing to worry about.
This crossing always used to be a 24 Hr crossing. I do not know if it has changed recently.
Pembima crossing is open 24 hrs both directions. Good Luck
